message.entry: Requires at least one input.
GENTYPE must be a character vector containing the name of a generator algorithm.
SEED must be a nonnegative integer value less than 2^32.
PARAMETERS must be a vector of non-negative integer values.
PARAMETERS is not allowed for {0} generators.
Creation of empty RandStream objects is not allowed.
Concatenation of RandStream objects is not allowed. Use a cell array to contain multiple objects.
Undefined function ''{0}'' for input arguments of type ''RandStream''.
You may not create a legacy stream.
Wrong number of arguments.
Parameter name must be text.
Unrecognized parameter name: {0}.
Ambiguous parameter name: {0}.
Unrecognized RAND keyword.
Unrecognized RANDN keyword.

Using ''{0}'' to set {1}''s internal state causes RAND, RANDI, and RANDN to use legacy random number generators. This syntax is not recommended. See Replace Discouraged Syntaxes of rand and randn to use RNG to replace the old syntax.

You have used ''{0}'' to read the internal state of a {1} random number generator that is not currently active, which most likely returns a result that is not valid. This syntax is not recommended. See Replace Discouraged Syntaxes of rand and randn to use RNG to replace the old syntax.
Invalid or deleted object.
Error {0} from plugin generator: ''{1}''
Unexpected error from plugin generator.
